title: Alien [DVD]
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Gordon Carroll, David Giler, Walter Hill and Ridley Scott
brief_description: A sci-fi thriller with a difference. The crew aboard the space freighter Nostromo investigate a distress call and one of the crew members brings back on board an Alien of unknown origin. In comparison to the technology dominated sterile world controlled by a computer, where no-one trusts anyone, the horror of the Alien is its very organic nature. Under Scott’s direction this film is grippingly suspensful and draws interesting parallels between the perfect inhumanity of the Alien and that of the Company. Cast includes: Sigourney Weaver, Harry Dean Stanton, John Hurt.
